mapper.select: SELECT VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, IS_IN_PART, IS_IN_BAYES, 0 as ORDEN, 0 as PESO, 0 as APLICA_FILTRO, 0 as APLICA_AGRUPACION, 0 as INFLUYE_BAYES, 0 as CORRIGE_BAYES FROM MD_VARS_INF
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MD_VARS_INF

SELECT VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, IS_IN_PART, IS_IN_BAYES, 0 as ORDEN, 0 as PESO, 0 as APLICA_FILTRO, 0 as APLICA_AGRUPACION, 0 as INFLUYE_BAYES, 0 as CORRIGE_BAYES
FROM MD_VARS_INF WHERE VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = #{variableInfluenciaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MD_VARS_INF ( VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, IS_IN_PART, IS_IN_BAYES ) VALUES ( #{variableInfluenciaId}, #{nombre}, #{descripcion}, #{activo}, #{etiqueta}, #{orderByField}, #{groupByField}, #{selectFields}, #{isInPart}, #{isInBayes} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MD_VARS_INF SET VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = #{variableInfluenciaId}, NOMBRE = #{nombre}, DESCRIPCION = #{descripcion}, ACTIVO = #{activo}, ETIQUETA = #{etiqueta}, ORDER_BY_FIELD = #{orderByField}, GROUP_BY_FIELD = #{groupByField}, SELECT_FIELDS = #{selectFields}, IS_IN_PART = #{isInPart}, IS_IN_BAYES = #{isInBayes} WHERE VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = #{variableInfluenciaId}
mapper.select: SELECT VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, VI.IS_IN_PART, VI.IS_IN_BAYES, VIR.ORDEN, VIR.PESO, APLICA_FILTRO, APLICA_AGRUPACION, 0 as INFLUYE_BAYES, 0 as CORRIGE_BAYES FROM MD_VARS_INF VI INNER JOIN MD_VARS_INF_INDICADORES_ROLES VIR ON VIR.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID INNER JOIN MD_ROLES R ON R.RID = VIR.RID WHERE VI.ACTIVO =1 AND ((VIR.APLICA_FILTRO = 1) OR (VIR.APLICA_AGRUPACION = 1)) AND R.RNAME = #{roleName} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, VI.IS_IN_PART, VI.IS_IN_BAYES, VIR.ORDEN, VIR.PESO, APLICA_FILTRO, APLICA_AGRUPACION, 0 as INFLUYE_BAYES, 0 as CORRIGE_BAYES FROM MD_VARS_INF VI, MD_VARS_INF_INDICADORES_ROLES VIR, MD_USUARIOSROLES UR, MD_USUARIOS U WHERE ACTIVO =1 AND ((APLICA_FILTRO = 1) OR (APLICA_AGRUPACION = 1)) AND U.U_ID = UR.U_ID AND U.UNAME = #{userName} AND UR.RID = VIR.RID AND VIR.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AND INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} ORDER BY PESO

SELECT VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, VI.IS_IN_PART, VI.IS_IN_BAYES, VII.ORDEN, VII.PESO, APLICA_FILTRO, APLICA_AGRUPACION, INFLUYE_BAYES, CORRIGE_BAYES FROM MD_VARS_INF VI, MD_VARS_INF_INDICADORES VII WHERE ACTIVO = 1 AND ((APLICA_FILTRO = 1) OR (APLICA_AGRUPACION = 1) OR (INFLUYE_BAYES = 1) OR (CORRIGE_BAYES = 1)) AND INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} AND VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VII.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID ORDER BY NOMBRE ASC

SELECT VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID, NOMBRE, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, ETIQUETA, ORDER_BY_FIELD, GROUP_BY_FIELD, SELECT_FIELDS, VI.IS_IN_PART, VI.IS_IN_BAYES, VII.ORDEN, VII.PESO, VII.APLICA_FILTRO, VII.APLICA_AGRUPACION, VII.INFLUYE_BAYES, VII.CORRIGE_BAYES FROM MD_VARS_INF VI, MD_VARS_INF_INDICADORES VII WHERE ACTIVO =1 AND APLICA_AGRUPACION = 1 AND INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} AND VI.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID = VII.VARIABLE_INFLUENCIA_ID AND ORDEN = (SELECT MIN(ORDEN) FROM MD_VARS_INF_INDICADORES WHERE INDICADOR_ID = #{indicadorId} AND APLICA_AGRUPACION = 1)
